ch.icclab.cyclops.dashboard.bills

Class BillPDF

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
        • ch.icclab.cyclops.dashboard.bills.BillPDF

  • public class BillPDF
extends org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
    This class handles all the REST calls concerning bill PDFs. These include returning a PDF of an existing bill and creating new bills.

      This method creates a PDF file if it does not yet exist.
      org.restlet.representation.Representation getBillPDF()
      This method returns a Bill PDF if there is any.

        public BillPDF()

    • Method Detail

      • getBillPDF

        @Get
public org.restlet.representation.Representation getBillPDF()
        This method returns a Bill PDF if there is any. The method receives the the user's ID and two timestamps (from / to) from the dashboard frontend. The method then checks if there is a bill for the given user and the chosen time window. If there is, it will return the PDF.
        Returns:
        A file representation of the PDF

      • createPDF

        @Post(value="json")
public org.restlet.representation.Representation createPDF(org.restlet.representation.Representation entity)
        This method creates a PDF file if it does not yet exist. All the needed data is provided through POST parameters
        Parameters:
        entity - Request entity
        Returns:
        A file representation of the PDF
